# ignore all files starting with . or ~
##.*
~*

# ignore node dependency directories (used by grunt)
node_modules/
bower_components/
compiled/
.sass-cache/

# ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db
*.idea
*.TMP
*.tmp

# ignore Editor files
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
*.komodoproject

# ignore log files and databases
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite

# ignore compiled files
*.com
*.class
*.dll
*.exe
*.o
*.so

# ignore wordpress files
wp-config.php
.htaccess
htaccess.bak
htaccess.txt
robots.txt

# ignore backup and cache directory created by wordpress plugins
/cache/
/wp-content/advanced-cache.php
/wp-content/backup-db/
/wp-content/backups/
/wp-content/cache/
/wp-content/plugins/wordfence/tmp/
/wp-content/upgrade/
/wp-content/uploads/wp-sync-db/
/wp-content/wfcache/
/wp-content/wp-cache-config.php
/wp-snapshots/
/wp-content/w3tc-config/master.php
/wp-content/plugins/bwp-minify/cache/
## Wordpress All in One Security Firewall
/wp-content/aiowps_backups/
##Wocommerc Logs Files
/wp-content/uploads/wc-logs/
/wp-content/wflogs/
/wp-content/uploads/tmp/



# ignore server created files
error_log
/tmp/
/logs/
/log/
/cli/
/cgi-bin/

# ignore custom directories
/ajaxplorer/
/Codiad/
/codiad/
/ignore/
/qa/
/tool/

#IGNORE REALWORKS IMAGES
/wp-content/uploads/realworks/

#ignore netbeans project files and folders
/nbproject
.netbeans.xml
/.htaccess.originalfile.bkp
